2105850.name: ASTRID: Reverie
2105850.description:
'ASTRID: Reverie' is a horror-mystery adventure that combines classic 3D gameplay with FMV elements.

Imagine a technology that can digitize our knowledge and memories. Everything from your first kiss to your ability as a guitar player or programmer can be extracted, copied, and sold. In a not-so-distant future, this has become reality in form of the 'Mindscape'. This technology allows a person to enter the depths of their mind and fundamentally changed society.

Two weeks ago, Astrid’s life began to unravel. Overnight she loses her job, her relationships have become strained, she is plagued by excruciating headaches and strange episodes of vertigo.

As her condition worsens, she struggles to continue as usual but feels herself breaking down.

After terrifying hallucinations start to haunt her, Astrid begins to suspect the answers might lie inside her own mind, and running from them is no longer an option.


  • Face your fears and escape the defense mechanisms of Astrid's mind.
  • Solve riddles to help Astrid navigate the dangerous depth of her subconscious.


  • Point and Click: Investigate the world Astrid inhabits and unravel the mystery haunting her.
  • Explore the 'Mindscape' in 1st person: Find out more about Astrid’s life and uncover the secrets of the 'Mindscape'.


  • Influence the story and your relationships. People will react to Astrid’s behavior. Your decisions might change the course of her story for the better or worse.
